issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description: HADOOP-8662 removed the various tabs from the website. Our top-level README.txt and the generated docs refer to them (eg hadoop.apache.org/core, /hdfs etc). Let's fix that.
fields.summary: Update README and website to reflect HADOOP-8662

comments.body: I found only at few places.

While the redirects still working, I agree that it's better to use the right url-s.

The patch looks good to me. Will commit it to the trunk shortly.
Just committed to the trunk. Thanks the contribution [~boky01]
